articles.author: Stephen Collinson
articles.title: America faces a fateful moment ahead of Trump arraignment - CNN
articles.description: Donald Trump will take America through yet another grave and unprecedented national drama this week when he becomes the first ex-president to appear in court charged with a crime.
articles.content:

articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: NASA will unveil its first moon crew in 50 years tomorrow - Daily Mail
articles.description: Three Americans and a Canadian will be revealed to the world on Monday (April 3) as they gear up to fly around our lunar satellite as part of the Artemis II mission scheduled for 2024.
